item.title: Announcing dotnetramblings.com or how to build a .NET news aggregator site
item.description: Let's check how I build my new site www.dotnetramblings.com. This site is a .NET news aggregator that updates its content every three hours. The main technologies employed to build it include Hugo, Python and Github Actions.

item.title: How to deploy an Azure resource using Terraform when it is not available in the AzureRM official provider
item.description: This post is going to walk you through the options available when we want to create or update a service on Azure using Terraform, but it is not available on the AzureRM Terraform provider.

item.title: Testing Azure Private Endpoints DNS resolution over an Azure P2S VPN connection
item.description: The purpose of this post is to try out the new Azure DNS Private Resolver resource. To test it, we're going to try to solve one of the current issues that Azure VPN has right now: when connected over an Azure P2S VPN the private DNS zone resolution does not work. This becomes quite problematic when you're using private endpoints to secure some private resources, because there is no easy way to resolve the private endpoint DNS when connected to a P2S VPN.
